===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|i}}. Two interpretations of {{lang|zh|小}} as an ideogram are possible:
# It shows a person ({{zh-l|*人}}) with lowered arms, implying the meaning of ''[[small]]''. In contrast, {{zh-l|*大}} (the character for ''[[large]]''), symbolizes a person ({{zh-l|*人}}) with arms outstretched.
# It shows an item divided into smaller parts {{zh-l|*八}} by a knife {{zh-l|*亅}}.

In [[w:Oracle bone script|oracle bone script]] form, it is represented by a picture of three sand granules; compare with {{och-l|少}}, represented by four dots in its oracle bone script form.
